definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 81a. [[אֲשֵׁרָה]]: see now also GFM:EB ASHERAH Dr De 16:21 Allen:DB ASHERAH, all doubtful as to Can. goddess Asherah; question left open by Zim:KAT 3. 436 ff. (on Sem. goddess A širtu-Ašratu Id.:ib, 432 ff.); but v. Jerem:AT im Licht d. Alten Orients 207 (name of goddess Aširat in letter found at Taanach by Sellin (1902–3) and Id. lb.:ib. 37. 237) (Oppenheim’s find at Ras el-‘Ain in Mesop., stone shaft with veiled head as top, supposed to identify post with goddess; if 2Ki 23:7 refers to draped Asherim [v. on text Benz Bur], this even more plausible), Id.:ib. 23, 208 f. 236. On pictorial representations of Asherah-symbol v. WHWard:AJSL xix.l (Oct.1902).
